The steel pickaxe is a pickaxe stronger than the iron pickaxe. It can be used in combat or in mining to mine rocks. The steel pickaxe requires Mining level 6 and Attack level 5 to wield.

Like all pickaxes, a steel pickaxe cannot be made with the Smithing skill.

[[File:Steel pickaxe detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''steel pickaxe''' is a pickaxe stronger than the [[iron pickaxe]]. It can be used in combat or in [[mining]] to mine rocks. The steel pickaxe requires Mining level 6 and Attack level 5 to wield.

Like all pickaxes, a steel pickaxe '''cannot''' be made with the [[Smithing]] skill.
